headline: Putnam U.S. Large Cap Value Equity Concentrated SMA Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: In a challenging quarter for value stocks, the portfolio posted a negative return (-1.70% gross of fees and -2.43% net of fees), slightly outperforming Russell 1000 Value Index.
